website_summaries.verdict: This duo is the perfect start and finish to your manicure with your favorite nail color, plus it adds longevity when worn for usual activities, and adds shine to your polish.
pros: A set of two that includes Butter London's top-selling basecoat and topcoat
Dries quickly, and helps keep nail polish from chipping prematurely for many users
cons: Not all customers were impressed with the results as they experienced peeling or chipping
but following the application instructions helps increase wear

customer_reviews.title: Great polish
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Expensive but I do my own nails..I will pay a bit more for the products to last. Comes off VERY EASILY w/acetone remover. I used OPI polish for color. It wears off slowly as opposed to chipping. Much better! My nails grow out quickly so I only leave it on for 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Fudd

customer_reviews.title: Good temp but minor changes needed....
customer_reviews.text: I think it does what it says and it provides a nice shine and my polish lasted longer than regular polish but obviously it won't last as long as the chemical ladened gel polishes which are industrial strength. What I will say is that my only complaint about this product is that when it dries it almost pulls the polish from the edges and that's why people may be experiencing the chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Long, chip-free, shiny nails, with my favorite non-gel polish!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use butter London Patent-Gel Nail Basecoat and Topcoat, with my favorite non-gel OPI nail polish, and didn't get the long, chip-free wear that I wanted. With butter London's Hardware Shine UV Topcoat, which I put on over the regular butter London topcoat, I now have long, chip-free, shining nails!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Over the moon!
customer_reviews.text: The best top and bottom coats I have ever used. Even better than the salon. The regular nail polish left something to be desired (see my contrasting review) as it was sticky and not smooth to apply. But you simply cannot beat the top and bottom coat! I use them with less-expensive nail polish now and am over the moon with the long-lasting results!
customer_reviews.author: M.C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Gel without the UV and the chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Butter London nail care products and this is my newest addition. I like the durability of gel but don't want the effects of a UV lamp or the harsh chemicals. This set gives you the same shine and staying power but without the negatives. While it won't last two weeks it will definitely last way over what a traditional polish normally lasts. I personally have gotten a good seven days with no chips or peals.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rice

customer_reviews.title: but overall great product.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little expensive, but worth it. Wish the pricing would be a little bit more competitive, so more women would be able to use it, but overall great product. When the top coat dries, it recedes the nail polish
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: helps my nail polish last up to 5 to 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: helps my nail polish last up to 5 to 7 days, when usually it has chips within 2 to 3 days. I wash my hands quite a bit, and am very hard on nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting manicures
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Relatively quick drying time, polish lasts up to 2 weeks without chips (with 2 layers of color and drying in between base and top coats) Cons: Takes a lot of time/patience
customer_reviews.author: Allenej

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Not worth the cost at all. My nails chipped within 24 hours and it's not nearly as shiny as gel, not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pampered nails and it still chipped faster than OPI ...
customer_reviews.text: Chipped on the 3rd day. Light typing. NO washing dishes without gloves. No vigorous activities. Pretty pampered nails and it still chipped faster than OPI basecoat and topcoat which is sooooo much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: June Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: It had been 10 days now. The London Button polish in conjunction with this base and top coat has literally stayed on without chipping. I've even done dishes without gloves
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Boo
customer_reviews.text: I have very soft nails, BUT this didn't even last 24 hours before chipping. Boo
customer_reviews.author: Avidawn

customer_reviews.title: dry and crusty
customer_reviews.text: I've asked for a refund since the top coat arrived so dried and crusty it won't smooth onto nails. The base was okay, but the top coat was definitely not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It was not everything i wanted it to be. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not everything i wanted it to be. One day at work, 2 days after painting, the polish was just suddenly gone from one nail. It fell off in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wish the Top Coat Dried Quicker
customer_reviews.text: Really does make my mani last longer. Not 2 weeks, but i can get a good full week out of it. Just wish the top coat didn't take so long to dry.
customer_reviews.author: The Glass Box

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, cheaper top coats are better than this
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressed. I was looking for an alternative to gel that was quicker and cheaper... thus was a waste if $40. Peeled the next day all five times I used it. Rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Mason

customer_reviews.title: I have tried this and although it was expensive, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this and although it was expensive, it did keep my polish on longer. The topcoat dries fast which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Irobles202

customer_reviews.title: This is the best and I have tried them all
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and I have tried them all. my nails are chip free for 7 days (which never happens).
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this base and top coat
customer_reviews.text: Love this base and top coat. Best shine top coat I ever used. It does not last 10 days without chipping though, but it does last longer than other nail polishes.
customer_reviews.author: S Ray

customer_reviews.title: Chipped too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions, with base coat, polish and top coat. Chipped and peeled back the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M Nixon

customer_reviews.title: BAD NEWS!
customer_reviews.text: This product began to peel almost as soon as it dried.
customer_reviews.author: PAULINE T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay on any longer than regular nail polish. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stay on any longer than regular nail polish. The base coat seems to really stick to the nails though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved to save some money and do ti myself but ...
customer_reviews.text: This product lasts less than 12 hours even when professionally applied. Salons now use LED lights instead of U/V so I'm going back to my salon gel manicures. I would have loved to save some money and do ti myself but its not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! It doesn't ruin your nails like gel
customer_reviews.author: tina pate

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Polish On a Little Better Than Standard Top Coat.
customer_reviews.text: The gel base and top coat kept my polish on a little better than a standard base and top coat. I expected 2 weeks coverage based on review of several similar products, but my polish didn't last that long. Nothing beats pro gel and ultraviolet light drying.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I can get nine days out of a manicure if I use this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My polish chipped after one day. Not worth the $40 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Very shinny, shellac looking in appearance
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the base coat and top coat with two brands. Once with a brand-new butter london polish and once with an essie polish. The butter london polish with the gel top and tails set chipped soon after 1-2 days, but I am pretty rough on my nails. On the second use, I used an older essie polish and the result was much longer lasting - almost a week. Could be my application, but overall I still really like the set because my at-home manicure looks like I got a gel/shellac manicure. I agree with a previous user that the top coat does dry very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Even Last 24 Hours
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so badly. I tried it a few times and each time the manicure did not last more than 24 hours. I followed all instructions and allowed for adequate drying time in between coats. I also used it with and without butter nail color. Unfortunately, nothing I did seemed to work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work so well for me. The nail polish chipped off within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness Light

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. After the application dries, the product peels right off. If you do dishes, take a shower or even basic hand washing, the product peels off your nails. It does not stay regardless of the amount of time you allow for drying. This was a complete waste of my money. Additionally, you cannot return it. Completely worthless. I would give it zero stars if I could. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best base and top coat I have ever used. My at home mani lasts for at least 7 days or more and I have used some challenging colors to test it.
customer_reviews.author: ADSOSU

customer_reviews.title: Nails chipped after an hour!
customer_reviews.text: 40 dollars!! I'm so annoyed. Price would be worth it if it actually worked. Over the course of time, not having to get a gel manicure would save me money. However, five minutes after i got a manicure with it (used OPI polish) it chipped. Same a regular ole manicure. Honestly, save your money. Not worth it here.
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: This product produces a great shiny finish and is very chip resistant
customer_reviews.text: This product produces a great shiny finish and is very chip resistant. If you do decide to invest the money for this product, I would suggest also investing in a good cuticle remover and a ridge smoother. The base coat tends to magnify underlying imperfections, as opposed to other base coats that fill ridges.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Exaggerated Claims
customer_reviews.text: Sorry readers, this overpriced, over-hyped nail polish duo works just as well as having nothing on. Please do not pay for the premium, it just doesn't work as claimed. (Save that money for 5 or more new colors.) I've buffed my nail surface prior to applying, washed my hands to strip it off residual oil several times, but unfortunately, I get the same results every time. Chips the next day and fades within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Josy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try a new product that would give me long lasting, gel quality nails without the fuss of the traditional gel nail process. This sorely disappointed. I tried this product three times before I wrote this review. I used Dior Gel polish color, which is a very nice product. I will pay a little bit more and get their gel top coat to go along with their gel polish color. This product flaked, chipped and wore off within 2 days. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Ruined My Natural Nails
customer_reviews.text: This nail polish tore up my nails all the way to the bedding and doctors could not find a nutrient in my blood work that needed to be fixed. It's obvious it is this nail polish that destroyed them, and after three weeks I have had the ONLY option of clipping them all down and praying that the collagen supplement I am taking will make them grow back healthier in the upcoming months. If you have nail problems after the use of Butter, especially the base and topcoat -- which I used religiously -- here is your review that backs up that your destroyed nails not uncommon.
customer_reviews.author: Juicemaster

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My cheap drugstore brand, Sinful Colors, lasts MUCH longer than this. I'm very disappointed because I had heard good things about this brand. Even at 1/2 price, since I purchased it as a Prime Day special, it was too much.
customer_reviews.author: Hortensia GT

customer_reviews.title: I was quite disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed with this product. It dries quickly and it looks nice and shiny BUT! My polish chipped within a couple of days and it seems to pull the polish away from the edge of the nail so I have a thin strip of nail showing. I can get the same shine and a wekk or more with no chips from my AVON UV top coat for less than a quarter of this price.
customer_reviews.author: terrorlee317

customer_reviews.title: They're Always After More of My Money
customer_reviews.text: This gel-imitation base and top coat set must only work with the butter LONDON brand nail colors. It definitely did not provide gel nail-like strength and longevity when using other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Revolution

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to see this product as the salon ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see this product as the salon gel method ruined my nails. As others have stated, the top coat does dry quickly and the finish is shiny but my nails chip the next day. I have tried this several times with Butter, Essie, OPI and Zoya and have the same result no matter the brand of polish used. Very disappointing and not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like gel. NOT
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding? I had my nails done at Nordstrom for free during their anniversary sale. The sales woman said that this would last 1-2 weeks, like gel. NOT! It started peeling after 2 days. It's now 5 days out, my nails look horrible, and I'm taking it off as soon as I get home. There's no difference between this product and regular polish. If you want gel or shellac durability, you have to go that route.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie V. Winston

customer_reviews.title: A weeklong manicure revolution!
customer_reviews.text: I had my nails done with butter LONDON Top & Tails at the Nordstrom trend show and my manicure lasted for a full week before chipping- and it only chipped slightly at that point. I'm now 10 days out and my light colored polish is still passable. I am usually pretty hard on my nails- lifting weights, doing housework, and the normal daily wear and tear mean my manis usually last 3 days before needing a touch up. This gel set is amazing- it comes off with regular nail polish remover too. Totally worth the price for a beautiful manicure that lasts and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: ANCO

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: this LOOKS great. . . just as shiny as gel. But nails chipped the next day-- from typing.
customer_reviews.author: morgan and cooper's mom

product_meta.title: butter LONDON Patent-Gel Nail Top & Tails Set
product_meta.description: Patent-Gel Top & Tails is a revolutionary duo that puts patent-leather shine at your finger tips, without harsh chemicals or UV lamps. The high-shine, cushiony finish protects your nails from nicks and chips, and locks in your color for a long-lasting manicure.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
